Extension.name: pso_ExtractDependentIdsFromSlot
Extension.initParam: Returns a list of the dependent content ids from the relationships in the specified slot.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotname
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the slot whose owner content ids should be parsed from its relationships.

Extension.name: pso_ExtractOwnerIdsFromSlot
Extension.initParam: Returns a list of the owner content ids from the relationships in the specified slot.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotname
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the slot whose owner content ids should be parsed from its relationships.

Extension.name: pso_BuildDependentRelationshipsFromIds
Extension.initParam: Returns a list of the owner content ids from the relationships in the specified slot.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: fieldname
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the field providing the ids. (required)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotname
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the slot whose relationships should be modified to match ids contained in field. (required)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: templatename
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the template to be added to slot when relationships are created. (required)

Extension.name: pso_BuildOwnerRelationshipsFromIds
Extension.initParam: Returns a list of the owner content ids from the relationships in the specified slot.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: fieldname
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the field providing the ids. (required)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotname
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the slot whose relationships should be modified to match ids contained in field. (required)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: templatename
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the template to be added to slot when relationships are created. (required)
